title: [Neuroscience] Abnormal development of brain’s visual system may contribute to autism. Scans revealed abnormalities in the size, white matter and functional connectivity of the babies’ visual systems, and such irregularities were present long before any symptoms of autism were detectable.

[Neuroscience] Research has found that the risk of autism is seven times higher in Norwegian children with immigrant mothers. The over-representation of this population indicates that the mothers' immigrant backgrounds may impact the development of autism
